body_html:
I am able to run your code.

Looks like your client is not able to connect to these workers. Otherwise, you will see messages like: New connected subchannel at ...

You had specified a "chief" in your cluster but you didn't mention to start a chief job. Try remove the "chief" in your remote_cluster?
body_text:
I am able to run your code.
Looks like your client is not able to connect to these workers. Otherwise, you will see messages like: New connected subchannel at ...
You had specified a "chief" in your cluster but you didn't mention to start a chief job. Try remove the "chief" in your remote_cluster?
body:
I am able to run your code. 

Looks like your client is not able to connect to these workers. Otherwise, you will see messages like: `New connected subchannel at ...`

You had specified a `"chief"` in your cluster but you didn't mention to start a chief job. Try remove the `"chief"` in your `remote_cluster`?
